.pro files

Gsourcedoublet__define.pro

Oseen tensor for a source doublet oriented relative to the plane $z = 0$.

Gstokesdoublet__define.pro

Oseen tensor for a stokes doublet oriented relative to the plane $z = 0$.

Gstokeslet__define.pro

Oseen tensor for a stokelet.

blakeflow__define.pro

Flow field at specified points due to a stokeslet near a horizontal wall in the plane $z = 0$.

faxen__define.pro

Calculate the velocity, $\vec{v}(\vec{r})$, of a sphere of radius $a$ at position(s) $\vec{r}$ within a hydrodynamic flow, $\vec{u}(\vec{r})$.

flowfield__define.pro

Flow field $\vec{u}(\vec{r})$ at specified points $\vec{r}$ due to a set of flow sources.

flowsource__define.pro

Flow field $\vec{u}(\vec{r})$ at specified points $\vec{r}$ due to a localized source of flow consisting of an Oseen tensor $\mathsf{G}(\vec{r})$ and a driving force $\vec{f}_0$.

makedocs.pro
oseentensor__define.pro

Oseen tensor base class for describing hydrodynamic flows relative to specified positions.
